articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Underwater Test-fire of Strategic Submarine Ballistic Missile
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Underwater Test-fire of Strategic Submarine Ballistic Missile
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, guided on the spot the underwater test-fire of strategic submarine ballistic missile.
					 At the observation post he was briefed on the plan for the test-fire and gave an order for it.
					
					 As soon as the order was issued, the submarine submerged as low as the biggest depth of waters for launching and fired the ballistic missile. 
					
					 The test-fire was aimed to confirm the stability of the underwater ballistic launching system in the maximum depth of waters, flying kinetic feature under the vertical flight system of the ballistic missile powered by the newly developed high power solid fuel engine, the reliability of the phased heat separation and the working accuracy of nuclear detonating device of warhead at the preset altitude.
					
					 It fully confirmed and reinforced the reliability of the Korean-style underwater launching system and perfectly met all technical requirements for carrying out the Juche-based underwater attack operation.
					
					 He noted with great satisfaction that Juche Korea had access to one more means for powerful nuclear attack as required by the strategic intention of the Party Central Committee. He highly praised the officials, scientists and technicians in the field of national defence science and munitions factories for having successfully rounded off the technology of underwater launching of ballistic missile from a strategic submarine at a higher level.
					
					 The successful test-fire would help remarkably bolster up the underwater operational capability of the KPA navy, he said, adding that it is now capable of hitting the heads of the south Korean puppet forces and the U.S. imperialists anytime as it pleases.
					
					 This eye-opening success constitutes one more precious labor gift the defence scientists and technicians are presenting to the great leaders and the motherly Party.
					
					 He called on the reliable defence scientists and technicians to uphold through scientific practices the Party's strategic intention to react to nuclear weapons in kind. He urged them to step up the project for bolstering the nuclear force to mount nuclear attacks on the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group of traitors any time when the Party is determined to do.
					
					 He had a photo session with the defence scientists and service personnel of the navy who took part in the test-fire in celebration of the successful day.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks 84th Anniversary of KPA
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks 84th Anniversary of KPA
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place here Sunday to mark the 84th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA), the revolutionary armed forces of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So and Pak Pong Ju and other leading officials of the party, state and army, the chairperson of a friendly party, members of the  party central leadership organ in Pyongyang, officials of the party and armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials of institutions and industrial establishments here, persons of merits, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front and overseas Koreans.
					
					 Present there on invitation were foreign diplomatic envoys and military attaches in foreign embassies here.
					
					 KPA Vice Marshal Ri Myong Su, chief of the General Staff of the KPA, made a report in which he said:
					
					 The Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA), the first revolutionary armed forces of Juche type, was founded on April 25, Juche 21 (1932). Therefore, the Korean people could have the genuine revolutionary army led by the outstanding leader for the first time in history and this marked the starting point of the glorious history of the Korean revolution which was pioneered and has advanced victoriously by dint of the arms. 
					
					 President Kim Il Sung brought up the KPRA to be a powerful driving force of the anti-Japanese national-liberation struggle and core force of the Songun revolution in the flames of the anti-Japanese revolution and defeated the brigandish Japanese imperialists who made desperate efforts styling themselves the "leader" of Asia and thus accomplished the historical cause of the country's liberation.
					
					 Despite the complicated situation of building a new country after the liberation, he successfully realized the cause of building the regular armed forces in a short span of time and led to victory the great Fatherland Liberation War while holding fast to the arms of Songun in order to shatter the myth of "mightiness" of the U.S. imperialists who boasted of a war history of aggression that lasted more than a century and thus created the myth of war victory in the 20th century.
					
					 He consistently adhered to the idea of attaching importance to the arms and the principle of giving priority to the military affairs during the whole period of the revolutionary leadership, developed the KPA into the army of the party that thoroughly established the party's monolithic ideological system and into the powerful revolutionary armed forces all members of which were trained to be cadres and which were put on a modern basis, and turned the DPRK into an impregnable fortress and bulwark of independence by successfully putting all the people under arms and turning the whole country into a fortress.  
					
					 The cause of army-building of Juche started on Mt. Paektu was developed in depth onto a new stage thanks to the outstanding Songun revolutionary guidance of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Thanks to his outstanding and tested leadership, the KPA has grown stronger in terms of thought and faith guided by the Juche idea and Songun idea and the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army firmly armed with Korean-style strategy and tactics and war methods and equipped with modern offensive and defensive means. 
					
					 The KPA has greeted the golden age of bolstering up the revolutionary armed forces as they are led by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Once the weak colonial nation oppressed by the aggressors with its sovereignty deprived by the aggressors due to the weak arms has developed into the world-level military power and the nuclear power of Juche that no one dares provoke, striking terror into the imperialist reactionaries.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists introduced strategic weapons into south Korea in a bid to stage frantic joint military drills against the DPRK and brought the clouds of a nuclear war to hang over Korea, escalating the situation to an extreme phase.
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers persistently stage nuclear provocation aimed to hurt the supreme leadership of the revolution despite the repeated warnings of the DPRK, the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army will launch a preemptive strike of severest punishment in the sky, land, seas and underwater without any restriction and without any warning and prior notice.
					
					 The enemies have to clearly understand that the strike of the Korean People's Army which regards it as the greatest mission to devotedly safeguard the leader knows no mercy and this will be continued nonstop until the historic cause of national reunification is accomplished and the root cause of aggression and evil is totally eliminated.

articles.title: DPRK FM Speaks at Signature Ceremony for Paris Agreement on Issue of Climate Change
articles.content:
DPRK FM Speaks at Signature Ceremony for Paris Agreement on Issue of Climate Change
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong made a speech at the Signature Ceremony for Paris Agreement on the Issue of Climate Change held at the UN Headquarters on April 22.
					 He said:
					
					 The Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK) has signed the Paris Agreement. It stems from its intention to join the international efforts to resolve the issue of climate change as well as from its belief that the Agreement will be successfully implemented.
					
					 A touch-and-go dangerous situation prevails on the Korean peninsula due to the reckless nuclear war drills by the U.S. and its followers and their vicious attempts to stifle the DPRK by means of sanctions. Even under such circumstances, the DPRK government is exerting its great efforts to make active contributions to the protection of the global environment.
					
					 Following the farsighted vision and outstanding leadership of the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un, first Chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, we have declared the reforestation as a war with nature and are engaged in an all-our campaign a nationwide scale.
					
					 The DPRK has set a plan to afforest and reforest 1.67 million hectares of mountain areas by 2024, which means a yearly capacity of reducing 10 million tons of greenhouse gas will be newly created by means of forest's efficient absorption of the greenhouse gas.  
					
					 It is also under the national attention that the DPRK government is formulating a workable plan to decrease the greenhouse gas emissions by 2030, a target to be voluntarily observed under the Paris Agreement.
					
					 The DPRK government will continue to pay due attention to resolve the issue of global climate change under the principle of giving priority to the sound development of the economy and improvement of people's living standard.
					
					 The goals set forth by the Paris Agreement are not easy to achieve nor can they be reached by themselves.
					
					 Signing of the Agreement is of significance, but what is more important is for all the signatories to work together with political commitment to accomplish the goals. 
					
					 In this regard, the DPRK delegation believes we have to pay the foremost attention to the following issues.
					
					 First, in order to resolve the global environmental problem, it is crucial to pay primary attention to ensuring peace and security of the world.
					
					 The current extremely dangerous situation on the Korean Peninsula caused by the U.S. consistent nuclear war drills shows that, without ensuring world peace and stability, we cannot expect successful solution to any other issues.
					
					 Second, economic powers that are responsible for most of global greenhouse gas emissions have to make voluntary plans to dramatically reduce their greenhouse gas emissions and faithfully implement their plans.
					
					 Right now, majority of the global carbon emissions is produced by only a handful of countries. Such being the situation, it is self-evident that, without sincere efforts and contributions from these countries, we cannot achieve the goals of the Paris Agreement.
					
					 Third, the developed countries should feel their historical responsibilities of the current climate change and support the developing countries in the efforts to reduce the greenhouse gas emissions.
					
					 It is important to take practical steps to implement the Paris Agreement including establishment of an institutional mechanism to raise sufficient funds for the global efforts for reduction of greenhouse gas emissions.
					
					 As a signatory to the United Nations Convention on Climate Change, the DPRK will continue to fulfil its responsibilities and duties in the efforts to protect the global environment and resolve the climate change problem.

articles.title: Congratulations to Lao FM
articles.content:
Congratulations to Lao FM
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, foreign minister of the DPRK, Saturday sent a congratulatory message to Saleumxay Kommasith upon his appointment as foreign minister of Laos.
					 The message wished the Lao foreign minister big success in his new job, expressing belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries, mutual support and cooperation in the regional and international arenas, in particular, would grow stronger.

articles.title: Bangladesh Jatiya Party Signs Pyongyang Declaration
articles.content:
Bangladesh Jatiya Party Signs Pyongyang Declaration
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- The Bangladesh Jatiya Party Thursday signed the Pyongyang Declaration "Let Us Defend and Advance the Cause of Socialism".
					 Signing the declaration, Secretary General Mostafa Jamal Haider said: Our party fully supports the cause of the Workers' Party of Korea. I hope that the Seventh Congress of the WPK will be held successfully.

articles.title: Int'l Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu to Be Inaugurated
articles.content:
Int'l Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu to Be Inaugurated
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- A declaration was adopted at the inaugural meeting for the American regional preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu held in Lima, Peru on April 13.
					 The declaration said President Kim Il Sung waged decades-long bloody battles to set a world example in their struggle for national liberation and human emancipation and leader Kim Jong Il dedicated his whole life to the Songun revolution to bring happiness to the people and prosperity to the country, adding that they have been revered by all people as the eternal sun and peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The declaration called upon all American countries to form the preparatory committees, set the "year praising the great men" from April this year to the Day of the Sun (birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung) next year and organize significant political and cultural events on several occasions.
					
					 The declaration called for forming the International Preparatory Committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Sent to DPRK Missions Abroad
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Sent to DPRK Missions Abroad
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Foreign political parties, ministries, organizations, institutions and figures of various circles sent floral baskets to the DPRK missions in their countries between April 5 and 16 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 Floral baskets and bouquets were laid before the portraits of the President and leader Kim Jong Il and photos and art pieces of the great leaders standing together.
					
					 They came from the Maritime Territorial Branch of the United Russia Party, Vladivostok City Assembly, Maritime Territorial Branch of the All-Russia Women's Council "Hope of Russia", Commission for External Affairs of the C.C., the Communist Party of Vietnam, Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Ministry of Defense, Ministry of Security, Ministry of Industry and Commerce, Ministry of Culture, Sports and Tourism, Dhan Dan newspaper, Vietnam General Confederation of Labor, Vietnam Farmers Union, Academy of Social Science, Ho Chi Minh Museum, Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Kindergarten, Lao Ministry of Public Security, Lao Federation of Trade Unions, Military Area Command of Vientiane City of the Lao People's Army, Lao-Korea Friendship Association, People's Party of Cambodia, Cambodian Parliament, Iranian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Islamic Revolutionary Proletarian Organization of Iran, Iranian Workers' House, Thailand-Korea Friendship Association, Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand, Rajabat Pranakorn University, Malaysia-Korea Tourist Company Ltd., Algerian preparatory committee for celebration the Day of the Sun, Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist), Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist－Leninist), New Communist Party of Britain, Socialist Labor Party of Britain, British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, Korean Friendship Association UK, Workers' Party of Peru, the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, deputy prime minister and concurrently foreign minister of Laos, Lao minister of Defense, chairwoman of the C.C., the Lao Women's Union, secretary general of the China Hong Kong Zhonghwa Energy Fund Commission, chairman of the Emperor Group of Hong Kong, general manager of the Golden Trip Travel Service Co. Ltd., Hong Kong, director general of the Metropolis Natural Resource Co. Ltd., chairman of the Supreme Council of the New Socialist Party of Romania, chairman of the Socialist Party of Romania, secretary general of the Romanian Workers' Association, secretary general of the Romania-Korea Friendship Association, chairman of the National Executive Committee of the Polish Communist Party, chairman of the Communist Party of Germany, chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany, vice-chairman of the Federal Republic of Germany－DPRK Association, organizational secretary of the German Branch of the Korean Friendship Association, secretary general of the General Union of the Algerian Workers, co-chairman of the Board of Directors of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation, councilor of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea.
					
					 The general chairwoman and the secretary general of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle sent a large floral board to the DPRK embassy on April 15.

articles.title: Fine Art Exhibition Draws Many Visitors
articles.content:
Fine Art Exhibition Draws Many Visitors
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- The Songhwa fine art exhibition opened at the Pyongyang International House of Culture on April 12 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, the birthday anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (April 15), drawing many experts, fans and other citizens.
					 Put on display at the exhibition are nearly 70 fine art pieces presented by painters in their seventies and eighties.
					
					 Seen in the exhibition hall is a fine art work depicting smiling Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 What catch one's eye are Korean painting "President Kim Il Sung's birthplace in Mangyongdae" and oil painting "Mangyongdae in April".
					
					 Korean painting "We'll Go to Mt. Paektu" and oil painting "Mt. Paektu in Winter" feature grandiose looks of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Seeing oil painting "Letters of Faith" and Korean painting "Bamboo", visitors renewed their resolve never to abandon revolutionary faith.
					
					 Among fine art pieces are those showing goshawk (national bird of the DPRK, pine (national tree), magnolia (national flower), scenic beauties as well as the look of children playing folk games.

articles.title: Seriously-burned Student Recovered in DPRK
articles.content:
Seriously-burned Student Recovered in DPRK
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, a patient with serious burns left the North Phyongan Provincial People's Hospital of the DPRK after recovering his health thanks to the sincere efforts of its medical workers.
					 The patient is a student of the Sinuiju Disabled Soldier's School.
					
					 According to Ri Jong Il, vice-director of the hospital, the student was in a critical condition in mid-July last year when he was carried to the hospital after getting 2-3 degree burns on 72 percent of his body.
					
					 Medical workers of the hospital had over 40 rounds of consultations for recovery of his health while many teachers and students from universities in Sinuiju City volunteered to donate their blood and flesh for the patient.
					
					 Rounds of skin-grafting operations proceeded with hundreds of people in attendance. Used in the operations were thousands of square centimeters of skin, 4 600 ml of blood and 350 liters of various transfusions.
					
					 And a large number of citizens had made sincere efforts for the health recovery of the student while he was in the hospital.
					
					 After all, the patient could recover his health completely in half a year and this is a true picture of our socialist system where all the people form a large harmonious family, the vice-director of the hospital said.

articles.title: Feats of Kim Il Sung, Founder of Revolutionary Paektusan Army
articles.content:
Feats of Kim Il Sung, Founder of Revolutionary Paektusan Army
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- With the approach of the 84th birthday of the Korean People's Army, the servicepersons and civilians in the DPRK recollect the undying feats President Kim Il Sung performed in founding the Juche-based revolutionary armed forces.
					 Kim Il Sung, who inherited two pistols from his father in his early years, fathered the Songun (military-first) idea based on the principle of attaching importance to the army and the military affairs while making revolution.
					
					 At the Kalun meeting in June 1930 and the Mingyuegou meeting in December 1931, he set forth the line of anti-Japanese armed struggle and the idea of waging the armed struggle based mainly on guerrilla warfare.
					
					 Then he declared an anti-Japanese war under the slogan "Oppose arms with arms, and oppose counterrevolutionary violence with revolutionary violence!" and founded the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA), the first armed forces of Juche type in Korea, on April 25, 1932. The birth of KPRA made it possible for the Korean people to advance the Korean revolution to victory by dint of arms.
					
					 He led the anti-Japanese war to victory to liberate Korea from Japan's colonial rule and developed the KPRA into the Korean People's Army (KPA), regular revolutionary armed forces. In the 1950-1953 Korean War the KPA defeated the U.S. imperialist aggressors boasting of being "the strongest" in the world and reliably defended the freedom and independence of the country.
					
					 The KPA is now displaying its might as Kim Jong Un's powerful revolutionary army, the invincible Paektusan army possessed of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's strategy and tactics, the heroic fighting spirit and the perfect capability to fight an actual war.

articles.title: Yellow Dust Observed in DPRK
articles.content:
Yellow Dust Observed in DPRK
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Yellow dust is observed in the DPRK from April 22 to 24.
					 According to Choe Kyong Sik, section chief of the National Meteorological Forecast Squad, it is the fifth this year, but is longer in duration and higher in minute concentration than ever before.
					
					 It might be influenced by low pressure moving from its nidus, he said, adding that yellow dust would be observed till May.

articles.title: Chongryon Help Disaster-Hit Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Chongryon Help Disaster-Hit Koreans in Japan
Tokyo, April 23 (KNS-KCNA) -- The General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) is rendering active aid to Koreans in Japan who suffered damage done by the strong earthquake that hit Kumamoto, Kyushu, Japan on April 14.
					 The Central Standing Committee of Chongryon formed its measure headquarters for rescuing compatriots who suffered damage done by quake in Kumamoto, set up its emergency measure committee at the Fukuoka Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon near Kumamoto Prefecture to aid disaster-stricken compatriots.
					
					 Sympathy money in the name of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon was conveyed to those disaster-hit Koreans.
					
					 Officials of the Fukuoka Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon visited the Kumamoto Prefectural Headquarters with aid materials including food and daily necessities prepared by the Chongryon Central Standing Committee.
					
					 The chairman and other officials of the Kumamoto Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon visited disaster-hit families to convey sympathy money and aid materials.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's "Sanctions" against DPRK Will Be Fruitless: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's "Sanctions" against DPRK Will Be Fruitless: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Park Geun Hye group of traitors never drops its hideous confrontational ambition to hurt the compatriots in the north with the backing of outsiders, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a commentary.
					 At a recent consultation of vice foreign ministers with the U.S. and Japanese masters in Seoul, the puppet group earnestly asked them to "ratchet up pressure" and "impose tougher sanctions" upon the DPRK, talking about "crucial and urgent issue of dismantling the north's nuclear weapons", "missile threat" and "additional provocation," the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The consultation, a confab between the U.S. and its lackeys to screw up "sanctions" and "pressure" on the DPRK, is no more than a futile move of the reactionaries of history exasperated by the toughest stand of the DPRK. 
					
					 No matter how desperately the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces may resort to "sanctions", they will never browbeat the DPRK remaining unchanged in its faith despite severe "sanctions" and blockade by the hostile forces.
					
					 The ever-strong mettle of the great Paektusan nation is smashing the "sanctions" moves of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime and dealing a sledge hammer blow to the hostile forces seized with a wild ambition for escalating confrontation.
					
					 The threadbare "sanctions" racket kicked up by the distracted south Korean regime in collusion with the U.S. and Japan is no more than a foolish act.
					
					 Their louder talk about "tougher sanctions and pressure" only reveals their uneasiness.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Demand Japan Provide Equal Right to Education to Korean Schools in Japan
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Demand Japan Provide Equal Right to Education to Korean Schools in Japan
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- At least 130 civic and public organizations of south Korea including the "Citizens Council for Defending Our Schools and Children", the Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps and the Women's Solidarity held a press conference before the Japanese embassy in Seoul on April 22 and released a joint statement demanding Japan provide the equal right to education to Korean schools in Japan, according to the south Korean online newspaper Thongil News.
					 The statement denounced the Japanese government's continuous discrimination measures which exclude only Korean schools among foreign schools from the tuition-free program for senior high schools, terming it human rights violation abusing political issue.
					
					 Speakers at the conference demanded the Japanese judiciary authorities put on the brake the discrimination measure of the government and make sure that support and subsidies of local self-governing bodies are provided to the Korean schools consistent with the tuition-free program for senior high schools under the Japanese law and the International Convention on Human Rights and thus realize the equal right to education.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Urges 20th NA to Lend Ear to Public Voice
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Urges 20th "National Assembly" to Lend Ear to Public Voice
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) --The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty in south Korea issued a statement on April 20 warning the 20th "National Assembly" to lend an ear to angered public voice. 
					 The lawmakers of the 20th "National Assembly" should bear in mind the people's mindset, it said, clarifying the following items of demand:
					
					 First, the 20th NA should turn out in probing the truth behind the ferry Sewol sinking accident.
					
					 Second, the 20th NA should clear the people of suspicion about the fraudulent "presidential" election.
					
					 Third, the 20th NA should clear the suspicion about the "north wind".

articles.title: American Regional Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Inaugurated
articles.content:
American Regional Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Inaugurated
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- An American regional preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was formed in Lima, Peru on April 13.
					 Genaro Ledesma Izquieta, chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, Osvaldo Larriva Alvarado, chairman of the Economic Committee of the Ecuadorian Parliament, and Acilino Riveiro, chairman of the Brazilian committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il were elected co-chairmen of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events praising the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un in the region in touch with the preparatory committees of countries in the region with the approach of the meeting.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Posted by Austrian Body on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Posted by Austrian Body on Its Website
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "On the Occasion of Founding the Anti-Japanese People's Guerrilla Army" was posted by the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and the DPRK on its website on April 18 on the occasion of the founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 The work, published on April 25, Juche 21 (1932), deals with the motive and significance of the founding of the Anti-Japanese People's Guerrilla Army and its goal and mission. It also indicates the tasks to be carried out to strengthen the army and the ways to do so.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Foreign Political Parties, Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Foreign Political Parties, Organizations
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Political parties and organizations of foreign countries posted special write-ups on their websites between April 11 and 13 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Party of Communists of Russia edited an article titled "Sunny smile" illustrated with a photo of the President.
					
					 The article said that the President founded the Juche idea, Songun idea, defeated two formidable imperialisms in one generation, turned the DPRK into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence, devoted himself to reunifying the country and accomplishing global independence and took warm care of all people with his limitless attraction.
					
					 The Czechoslovak Communist Party in an article titled "Comrade Kim Il Sung, founder and eternal President of socialist Korea" said that the past, present and future of Korea would be unthinkable apart from him.
					
					 It went on: He embarked upon the road of revolution in his teens, founded the Juche idea and led the anti-Japanese war to victory, accomplishing the historic cause of national liberation.
					
					 After the liberation of the country, he founded the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK.
					
					 He devoted all his life to the prosperity of the country and happiness of the people.
					
					 His august name will shed its rays forever together with the history of victory of socialist Korea.
					
					 The United Left Party of Venezuela in articles explained in detail the validity, truth and invincible vitality of the Juche idea founded and developed in depth by the President and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Polish Branch of the Korean Friendship Association in an article introduced the revolutionary career of the President who performed great feats which will shine long with history.

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed by Russian Newspaper
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed by Russian Newspaper
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- The Russian newspaper Komsomolskaya Pravda carried special write-ups several times between April 6 and 15 illustrated with portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and his photos and photos of leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un on the occasions of the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of the President) and the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 In an article titled "Sunny smile" it said one can see the image of the President like the sun everywhere in the DPRK. It introduced in detail the satisfaction and pride of human being and statesman with the smile of the great man and the conviction and optimism about the bright future of socialist Korea.
					
					 The newspaper in an article titled "Kim Il Sung, great man of century" said the human history records many prominent figures but does not know such a great man as the President who has been boundlessly revered by all people for centuries.
					
					 In an article titled "Outstanding strategist" it dealt with the undying feats performed by the President in the Fatherland Liberation War, citing the data on the bitter defeat the U.S. imperialists suffered while vaunting victory.
					
					 In an article titled "Bright plan for socialist construction being translated into reality" it said that the Workers' Party of Korea led to victory the  difficult and complicated struggle in the 20th century and firmly united all the service personnel and people around their leaders to arouse them to defend socialism and provided a springboard for building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Uruguay
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Uruguay
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" was brought out in pamphlet by the Uruguayan Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The work, published on April 15, Juche 101 (2012), says the 100-year history of Kim Il Sung's nation clearly proves the immutable truth that outstanding leaders assure the dignity and prosperity of the country and the nation.
					
					 It sets forth the tasks to be fulfilled to glorify the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully carry out the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place in Montevideo on April 15.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days Celebrated in Indonesia
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days Celebrated in Indonesia
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- A friendly meeting took place in Jakarta and a ceremony of visiting the botanical garden in Bogor City, Indonesia on April 13 and 15 to mark the Day of the Sun (birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung) and the 51st anniversaries of Kim Il Sung's and leader Kim Jong Il's visit to Indonesia and the naming of Kimilsungia.
					 Present at the events were figures of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle and the Bogor Botanical Garden and masses, and staff members of the DPRK embassy in Jakarta.
					
					 The chairman in charge of international relations of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle said that the historic relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries provided by President Sukarno and President Kim Il Sung had been carried forward by General Chairwoman Megawati and HE Kim Jong Il. They are now invariably consolidated by the leaders of the new generation of Indonesia and supreme leader Kim Jong Un, the chairman noted, adding:
					
					 Members of the leadership and all members of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle would regard it as their bounden duty to develop generation after generation the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries and two parties provided by the preceding leaders and make all efforts to do so.
					
					 The deputy director of the Bogor Botanical Garden said that Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's visit to the garden was a historical event that laid a solid foundation for friendly relations between the two countries.
					
					 Kimilsungia presented to Kim Il Sung by Sukarno who was fascinated by the former's greatness is in fuller bloom as the symbol of friendship between the peoples of the two countries, he stressed.
					
					 He expressed his will to widely disseminate Kimilsungia with the honor of working at the garden associated with the historical visit by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Korean Photo, Book Exhibitions Held in Nigeria
articles.content:
Korean Photo, Book Exhibitions Held in Nigeria
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Korean photo and book exhibitions took place at various units of Nigeria from April 11 to 14 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. They included the Art and Cultural Council of the Ministry of Federal Capital Territory, the Franoson Mannyon International Company LTD., a housing construction company and the Road Management Bureau of the Ministry of Rural Development in Zamfara State.
					 Displayed at the venues of the exhibitions were photos dealing with the exploits of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display there were their works, and books and photos introducing the struggle of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 A department vice-director of the Art and Cultural Council of the Ministry of Federal Capital Territory praised Kim Il Sung for liberating Korea from the Japanese imperialists' military occupation and turning the DPRK into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 Kim Il Sung inflicted disgraceful defeat on the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world and won a great victory in the Fatherland Liberation War, he stressed.

articles.title: KPA Defends Justice and Peace: Indian Newspaper
articles.content:
KPA Defends Justice and Peace: Indian Newspaper
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- The Indian paper Rising Europe on April 15 carried an article titled "Defender of justice and peace" to mark the 84th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The KPA has reliably defended justice and peace on the forefront of the military standoff with imperialism since its founding, the article said, and went on:
					
					 The Korean People's Revolutionary Army, predecessor of the KPA, was founded on April 25, 1932 and carried out the historic cause of liberation of Korea on Aug. 15, 1945 by beating down the Japanese imperialist aggressors.
					
					 After the liberation of Korea the KPA developed into the regular armed forces. It resolutely shattered the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces in the Korean war, honorably defending the sovereignty and dignity of the country.
					
					 After the war the KPA smashed all military provocations of the U.S. imperialists such as the U.S. armed spy ship Pueblo case, large spy plane EC-121 case, Panmunjom incident, clearly showing the world how the justice was defended.
					
					 The KPA hasn't vacillated in defending the just cause.
					
					 The Korean peninsula is the biggest hotspot with great potentialities in which a war may break out.
					
					 However, peace is defended on the peninsula.
					
					 What is the reason? It is ascribable to the invincible might of the KPA and the powerful war deterrent of the DPRK.
					
					 War will never break out on the peninsula and the regional peace will be ensured forever as long as the invincible KPA stands guard.

articles.title: No One Can Match Korean People: Peruvian Personage
articles.content:
No One Can Match Korean People: Peruvian Personage
Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- No one can match the great power of the Korean people.
					 Genaro Ledesma Izquieta, chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, said this at the inaugural meeting of the American regional preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu held in Lima, Peru on April 13.
					
					 He went on say:
					
					 The DPRK is not only a politico-ideological power in which the leader, party and masses are firmly united as one but also a worldwide military power and science and technology power.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces have accused the DPRK of "threatening" the world with nuclear weapons and ratcheted up the hostile moves against the DPRK with harsh sanctions and pressure.
					
					 This is intended to make the DPRK lower the banner of socialism.
					
					 The DPRK is a nuclear power with H-bomb and science and technology power which launches satellites with its own efforts and technology.
					
					 The U.S. can never frighten nor provoke the DPRK.
					
					 We will as ever fully support the just cause of the Korean people advancing under the tested leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige lanzamiento de proyectil balistico en submarino estrategico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige lanzamiento de proyectil balistico en submarino estrategico
Pyongyang, 24 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno un lanzamiento de ensayo del proyectil balistico en el submarino estrategico.
					En el puesto de vigilancia, el Mariscal escucho un plan de lanzamiento y dio la orden de realizarlo.
					
					Inmediatamente se dio alarma de combate en el submarino y este se sumergio rapidamente hasta la profundidad maxima de lanzamiento y lanzo un proyectil balistico.
					
					El lanzamiento de ensayo se realizo con el objetivo de comprobar la estabilidad del sistema de lanzamiento del proyectil balistico en la profundidad maxima, la caracteristica dinamica de vuelo en el estado de vuelo vertical del proyectil balistico segun un nuevo motor de gran potencia por combustible solido, la confianza de separacion termica escalonada y la precision del movimiento del aparato detonante nuclear de la ojiva en la altitud fijada, a traves de lo cual se confirmo y se consolido por completo la credibilidad del sistema de lanzamiento submarino a estilo coreano y todos los indices tecnicos satisficieron bastante los requisitos por el cumplimiento de la autoctona operacion de ataque submarino.
					
					El Mariscal expreso su satisfaccion de que llegamos a poseer otro medio poderoso de ataque nuclear de Corea del Juche conforme al proposito estrategico del Comite Central del PTC y evaluo de alto los meritos de los funcionarios, cientificos y tecnicos de la rama de ciencia de defensa nacional y la fabrica de materiales belicos que perfeccionaron con excelencia en nivel superior la tecnica de lanzamiento submarino de proyectil balistico.
					
					Gracias al pleno exito en este lanzamiento de ensayo, se fortalecio notablemente la capacidad de operacion submarina de nuestras fuerzas navales, dijo y continuo que ahora podemos atacar sin restriccion en cualquier tiempo a espaldas de los titeres surcoreanos y los imperialistas yanquis.
					
					Senalo que tal exito asombroso deviene otro regalo laboral precioso de los cientificos y tecnicos del sector de defensa nacional, ofrecido a los grandes Lideres y el Partido madre.
					
					Y les exhorto a apoyar con practicas cientificas el proposito estrategico de nuestro Partido de enfrentarse con las armas nucleares a las nucleares y a acelerar el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares para que si decide el Partido, puedan asestar en cualquier momento golpe nuclear a los yanquis y traidores titeres surcoreanos.
					
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un tomo una foto de recuerdo para felicitar el significativo dia de exito junto con los cientificos de defensa nacional, oficiales y soldados de la marina del EPC quienes tomaron parte en el lanzamiento de ensayo.

articles.title: Acto central por 84o aniversario de fundacion de Ejercito Popular de Corea
articles.content:
Acto central por 84o aniversario de fundacion de Ejercito Popular de Corea
Pyongyang, 24 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 24 en esta capital el acto central por el 84o aniversario de la fundacion del heroico Ejercito Popular de Corea, fuerzas armadas revolucionarias del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					Asistieron alli Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente del partido amigo, los miembros de los organos directivos centrales del partido en esta capital, funcionarios de los organismos del partido y las fuerzas armadas, ministerios y organos centrales, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, funcionarios de organismos, fabricas y empresas en esta capital, los ameritados, el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang y los compatriotas en ultramar. 
					
					Fueron invitados los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises y los agregados militares, acreditados en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del vicemariscal del Ejercito Popular de Corea Ri Myong Su, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC. 
					
					El dijo que el 25 de abril del 21 (1932) de la Era Juche fue fundado el Ejercito Revolucionario Popular de Corea, primeras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de tipo jucheano, gracias a lo cual el pueblo coreano pudo contar por primera vez en su historia nacional con el verdadero ejercito revolucionario guiado por el destacado lider y desde entonces se inicio la historia gloriosa de la revolucion coreana allanada y avanzada victoriosamente con las fuerzas armadas. 
					
					En el fragor de la lucha armada antijaponesa el Presidente Kim Il Sung desarrollo el ERPC como fuerte grueso de la lucha antijaponesa por la liberacion nacional y pilar de la revolucion del Songun, y a base de ello, logro la historica causa de la liberacion de la patria tras derrotar al imperialismo japones que se autodenominaba como "caudillo" de Asia, recordo y continuo:
					
					Despues de liberacion de la patria, el Presidente realizo con brillantez en un corto tiempo de plazo la causa de construccion de las fuerzas armadas regulares aun en medio de la situacion complicada de la construccion de nueva patria. 
					
					Y al conducir con las fuerzas armadas del Songun a la victoria la gran Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, rompio el mito de "invencibilidad" del imperialismo norteamericano que se jactaba de su "supremacia" en la historia de guerra de agresion de mas de un siglo y creo el mito de victoria del siglo XX. 
					
					Durante todo el periodo de su direccion sobre la revolucion, mantuvo invariablemente la idea de dar importancia a las fuerzas armadas y el principio de priorizar los asuntos militares, fortalecio el EPC como ejercito del partido basado en el sistema de unica ideologia de esta agrupacion politica y como poderosas fuerzas armadas revolucionarias modernizadas y convertidas en el ejercito de cuadros, asi como logro el armamento de todo el pueblo y la fortificacion de todo el pais, de modo que la patria se ha convertido en una fortaleza inexpugnable y baluarte de la independencia.
					
					La autoctona causa de construccion del ejercito, iniciada en la selva del monte Paektu, se desarrollo y se profundizo en nueva etapa elevada gracias a la destacada orientacion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun.
					
					Bajo la destacada y probada guia del Dirigente, el EPC se desarrollo como poderoso ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu armado con la idea Juche, la del Songun y con las estrategias, tacticas y metodos de combate al estilo coreano y dotado de modernos medios de ataque y defensa. 
					
					Hoy dia, el EPC acoge la era dorada de su fortalecimiento, gracias a tener al Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Nuestra patria que era pais pequeno colonial debil privado de la soberania nacional por parte de los invasores se ha convertido en la potencia militar de talla mundial, potencia nuclear del Juche que tiembla a los reaccionarios imperialistas. 
					
					Ahora los imperialistas norteamericanos libran freneticos ejercicios belicos conjuntos anti-RPDC introduciendo sin titubeos los armamentos estrategicos en el suelo surcoreano y acarrean el nubarron de guerra nuclear sobre el territorio  patrio agravando extremadamente la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Si los imperialistas yanquis y los belicistas surcoreanos siguen recurriendo al alboroto nuclear contra la Direccion Suprema de la Revolucion Coreana, pese a nuestra reiterada advertencia, el ejercito revolucionario sin rival del monte Paektu asestara el golpe preventivo mas horrible en el cielo, la tierra, el mar y en la profundidad del mar sin restriccion alguna ni la advertencia ni el aviso previo. 
					
					Los enemigos deben tener presente que el ataque del EPC con la mision de defender a riesgo de vida al lider no tiene la piedad y continuara ininterrumpidamente hasta que se cumpla la historica causa de la reunificacion de la patria y se elimine completamente la fuente de agresion y males.

articles.title: "Sancion" anti-RPDC es inutil, subraya Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
"Sancion" anti-RPDC es inutil, subraya Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 24 de abril (ACNC) -- En un comentario individual del dia 24, el diario Rodong Sinmun censura a la banda traidora surcoreana que no quiere abandonar la malsana ambicion de enfrentarse con los connacionales en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras.
					En la reunion consultiva de los vicecancilleres del Sur de Corea, Estados Unidos y Japon, recien sostenida en Seul, los titeres surcoreanos pidieron a sus amos el "aplastamiento duro" y la "sancion mas fuerte" contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea diciendo que la "solucion del problema nuclear del Norte (de Corea) deviene un asunto importante y urgente", y hablando de la supuesta "amenaza de misil" y "provocacion adicional", revela el comentarista y continua:
					
					La llamada reunion de consulta, siendo un complot entre los amos y el lacayo para intensificar mas la "sancion" y el aplastamiento contra la RPDC, no pasa de ser una farsa inutil de los reaccionarios de la historia atemorizados ante el impetu poderoso de la RPDC que no se arrodilla ante cualesquier "sanciones" y presion.
					
					La RPDC ha venido por su camino recto de conviccion pese a toda clase de las "sanciones" y el bloqueo salvajes de las fuerzas hostiles.
					
					La potencia Paektusan, que se hace mas fuerte con el paso del tiempo, frustra la ambicion de enfrentamiento de las fuerzas hostiles rechazando las maniobras de "sancion" anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y la horda titere del Sur de Corea.
					
					Cuanto mas los titeres surcoreanos andan locos para levantar una oleada de "sancion" instigando a sus amos norteamericano y japones, tanto mas mostraran su inquietud e impaciencia.
